name: Association Nationale de la Recherche et de la Technologie
goal:
Support our 350 members, public and private French organisations involved in research and innovation activities to perform on the framework program and other programmes or tools such and the cohesion funds or the state aid rules.
Advocate their recommendations and needs for a fully user-frendly framework programme.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Education and training, External Relations, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Research and innovation

new area of interests:
Climate change/ carbone neutral
Industrial policy
